title: House Hunter
description: House Hunter is a delightful platform that simplifies the house rental process. It serves as a connecting bridge between house owners, who wish to rent out their properties, and house renters, who are seeking their dream homes.
features: Custom authentication system with MongoDB and JWT
MongoDB CRUD operations for individual users
Different dashboard route for house renter and house owner with full functionality
